title: The Backhanders
description: You cannot be serious! Two self-confessed tennis hacks take a look at the ins and outs of the greatest game on earth.

title: Check The Marc
description: Marc on Tour. Behind the scenes look at professional tennis from a professional coach.  Travel, on court, off court, its all covered.  What its really like on the professional tennis tours. Short and sweet.

title: Chewin' The Bat
description: Welcome to Chewin' The Bat, where we delve into the most up to date sporting headlines around Australia and across the globe. Tune in every week with Gus & Jack (alongside Producer Frae.) for a catch up on all things sports, our favourite segments and of course a few laughs

title: The Greek Tennis Podcast
description: Με παρουσιαστές τον Σωτήρη Χατούπη και τον Στάθη Σκαλούμπακα, σας σερβίρουμε τα μεγάλα Atp tour events, με τον αυστηρά αστείο και έντονα ερασιτεχνικό μας τρόπο.

title: game,(mind)set,match
description: Niamh Campbell, a senior in high school and full-time student-athlete, shares her story as she works to increase her mental strength and conquer competition anxiety. Niamh tells listeners about her personal journey in junior tennis—from being a carefree Red ball player, to (almost) smashing tennis racquets, and having an epiphany about her mindset. In a world that is becoming increasingly aware of mental health in professional sports, the pressure on younger athletes is just as real. Hear a story from a student-athlete, who is learning to maintain her mental health while trying to earn her way to the next level of her sport.

title: The W Club
description:
The W (dub) Club is a podcast dedicated to supporting sports at *Stephen F. Austin State University such as women's basketball, volleyball, bowling, track & field and more! #SupportWomenInSports #PlayLikeALadyjack 

*not affiliated with Stephen F. Austin State University

title: Friday Therapy with Logan & Jan
description:
Join Logan Hubbard and Jan Behrens as they explore the latest in culture, music, and food with friends of the show.
Live from Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. New episodes every Friday morning at 8 am EST. 

https://patreon.com/fridaytherapy

https://twitter.com/fridaytherapy_

https://instagram.com/fridaytherapy_

title: Tennis Junkie
description: For all those out there with a little tennis problem..

title: The TennisSection Podcast
description:
Welcome to The TennisSection Podcast!

We are a team of tennis enthusiasts who have experience both as college professionals, full professionals, and world-class coaches!

Every week we discuss new topics in the world of tennis, predict how upcoming players and tournaments will occur, as well as answer some of your questions!

Follow us on Instagram and DM us your questions!

Meet the team:

Liam - co-founder of TennisSection from London, a tennis enthusiast who has followed the sport for as long as he can remember. Always ready for a debate and will talk your ear off about anything tennis related!

Andrew - co-founder and former ITF professional player. Currently, Andrew is a world-class coach who is currently Barbados’ David Cup Captain!

title: Broudy Tennis: Living At The 45º
description: Broudy Tennis brings you tennis podcasts for the player, coach and tennis parent. "Living At The 45º" offers a variety of discussions with tennis players, top coaches, magazine and book authors and more of tennis' best and brightest. Jack's guests are nothing short of inspirational, whether or not you play tennis. Tennis champions, their coaches and mentors have all had amazing journeys.

title: Tipsy Tennis Podcast
description:
Your host, Adam Borak, takes you through conversations about all things tennis with a little twist of lime. We introduce a new guest each week to keep the perspectives fresh and intriguing and we're not afraid to say the things broadcasters can't say live. 

If you're looking to learn about the inner workings of the game, industry, lifestyle, development, hot takes, and more... look no further. Kick back, crack one open with us, and enjoy!

Cheers!

title: Brews & Backhands
description: this will be a tennis podcast talking about the season and giving updates on tournments.

title: Tennis Bytes
description:
Welcome to Tennis Bytes, a podcast about for news, events and happenings from the world of tennis. New episode releases every Friday, 9 PM Indian Standard Time (IST).

The podcast is hosted by former junior tennis players Aadish Sardesai and Bhushan Sardesai. They are keen observers of the sport and work towards the growth of tennis in india through https://tennisnuts.co.in. Photo Credit: https://unsplash.com/@gmaggieri

title: The TennisONE Podcast
description: Fun discussions about ATP & WTA pro tennis

title: Beyond Greatness
description: Des nouvelles de l'aventure australienne démarrée le 15 avril 2023
